name: YOU SUCK!
description:
You suck! You suck so much, the mayor wants to give you an award for it! But the ceremony is in three days and who knows what scenarios you'll end up in that might change the course of your major suckage! try and get the highest score by selecting the worst responses to scenarios!

Special thanks to my good friend Erin Still you did all the artwork, except the player character art, that was me haha.

You can also download the GMS2 project file if you want.

Good luck!
